name: Pixel Express (itch)
description:
In Pixel Express you operate a railroad by switching rail junctions. Your goal is to deliver cargo and avoid collision between trains. Make your journey through 4 different seasons spiced up with unique chiptune soundtrack.






FREE DEMO

This is a free demo of the game with 1 chapter out of 4. If you enjoy Pixel Express and think that we should continue working on it, add it to the wishlist on Steam. Thank you!

Game by

8-BITchin’tendo - Music

Pavlo Shelyazhenko - Programming

Sergei “Cellinger” Buriak - Graphics

Andriy Bychkovskyi - Game Design, Programming
